FunctionValue.Expression:
-- returns true if it is an Org and person assignments are allowed
from allobjects select current (("Org"=tablename) and exists("orgroot", format("uid_orgroot in ( select uid_orgroot from org where uid_org = {0}) and uid_orgroot in ( select uid_orgroot from OrgRootAssign where UID_BaseTreeAssign = 'QER-AsgnBT-Person' and isassignmentallowed=1)", sqlformatvalue(pk, "string", "NonUnicodeLiterals"))))
